page.title: 03Halsey Estate
page.content: {Halsey Estate}is owned by Nick Halsey and Partners. The Estate was owned by the Halsey family in the 15th. century and today has 2000 acres in a complete block of land. There are 200 acres of woodland. There are three major enterprises, dairying and heifer rearing, arable crops, and a stud farm. On the farm there are 230 friesian cows. Roughly l000 acres of arable crops are grown. These are mainly cereals and winter wheat. 150 acres of rape are grown as a further cash crop. About eight full-time and five part-time staff are employed, plus some students. Mr.Halsey thinks the farm will remain very much the same over the next ten years.The Estate keeps to a policy of {conservation}to preserve the wildlife and ecology.
